sentence.Network_en: He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将以圣灵和火为你们施洗.

sentence.Network_en: I baptize you with water, but he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是用水给你们施洗,他却要用圣灵给你们施洗.

sentence.Network_en: I baptize thee in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost.
sentence.Network_cn: 我以圣父 、 圣子 、 圣灵的名义为你洗礼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 施字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 施为〖 behave;conduct〗 施洗〖 baptize〗 施行〖 execute;carryout〗.
附录:基督宗教字典 - 维基词典，自由的多语言词典 ... Baptism 浸礼 Baptize 洗礼 Bishop 主教.
“受洗(baptize)”意味着与耶稣同死同复活的重生(born again)。我们要知道信徒是受洗而归入他的死，所以因信称义的我们信徒不管是 …
英语专业八级词汇表_百度文库 ... Baptist n. 施洗者约翰,施洗者,浸信会教友 baptize vt. 施洗礼,提炼,命名 bawl v. 大叫，大喊.

list.abs: they believed that Jesus was an opponent of the good prophet John the Baptist-whom they nonetheless believe to baptized Jesus .他们认为耶稣是与施洗约翰（他们仍然认为是给耶稣受洗过的人)的好先知相对抗。
后来基督教施洗者约翰(John the Baptist)为耶稣等的洗礼仪式(to baptize)应该是源于此。荷马名著《伊里亚德》("Iliad"by Homer)，攻 …
The whole congregation got baptized that day ., 那天 , 所有的教众都得到了洗礼.
a sacrament admitting a baptized person to full participation in the church ., 承认受洗的人完全加入宗教的圣礼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : via Old French from ecclesiastical Latin baptizare, from Greek baptizein 'immerse, baptize'

entry.def: When someone is baptized, water is put on their heads or they are covered with water as a sign that their sins have been forgiven and that they have become a member of the Christian Church.

example.ex: At this time she decided to become a Christian and was baptised...
example.tran: 她此时决定成为基督教徒并接受了浸礼。

example.ex: I think your mother was baptized a Catholic.
example.tran: 我想你母亲受洗成了天主教徒。

auth_sentence.content: You baptize it, you prefer to only start it or with friends?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: You baptize it, you prefer to only start it or with friends?

sentences.en: He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
sentences.cn: 他将以圣灵和火为你们施洗。

sentences.en: He was baptized a Roman Catholic.
sentences.cn: 他受洗礼成为罗马天主教徒。
他们把他命名为约瑟夫。
